hero.title: Hello, my name is Jefferson Espinoza
hero.tagline: I am a Developer who is currently based in Riverhead, New York.

skills.title: Full Stack
skills.description: As a full-stack developer, I have hands-on experience working with both front-end and back-end technologies, building seamless, end-to-end web applications.

skills.title: Growth Minset
skills.description: I am a self-taught developer who thrives in learning new programming languages, tools, and concepts through hands-on experience and community resources.

skills.title: Strategy Minded
skills.description: As a strategy-minded developer, I approach problem-solving with a planned, goal-oriented mindset, focusing on long-term scalability and efficient decision-making.
